TopicTitle: "Houston, we've had a problem" - Apollo 13 returned to Earth 45 years ago today

Articles.Content: [**Ars Technica**](http://arstechnica.com/science/2015/04/apollo-13-the-mistakes-the-explosion-and-six-hours-of-live-saving-decisions/) has a nice read on the "successful failure" that was the Apollo 13 mission.
